price: Kandi iyi ni inzira ya Nyagasani wawe igororotse. Mu by’ukuri twasobanuye ibimenyetso byacu ku bantu bazirikana.
arabic: وَهَٰذَا صِرَٰطُ رَبِّكَ مُسۡتَقِيمٗاۗ قَدۡ فَصَّلۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَذَّكَّرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wahādhā ṣirāṭu rabbika mus'taqīman qad faṣṣalnā al-āyāti liqawmin yadhakkarūna
